description: Astronomers using Keck Observatory have imaged the dusty disk around HD 34282, a young star about 400 light-years away, revealing bright clumps and a 40 AU gap—clear signs of planet formation. The system provides a rare glimpse into early planetary birth, helping refine models of how gas and dust evolve into new worlds.
title: Astronomers Spot Signs of Baby Planets in a Star’s Mysterious Disk

description: New models suggest mini-Neptunes—planets smaller than Neptune with thick gas envelopes—may have solid rocky surfaces instead of molten magma. Data from NASA’s JWST revealed high-pressure atmospheres capable of compressing molten rock into solid crusts. This discovery challenges earlier assumptions and offers key insights into exoplanet composition and planetary formation theories.
title: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope Telescope Challenges Old Theories on Mini-Neptune Worlds

description: Ziddi Ishq is an upcoming JioHostar originals web series that will stream from Nov 21st, 2025. The series has been inspired by a Bengali film called Parineeta. It explores themes of love, obsession, and anger.
title: Ziddi Ishq OTT Release: Know When, Where to Watch the Aaditi Pohankar, Parambrata Chattopadhyay Starrer

description: The Bad Guys: Breaking In, a new animated show based on the Wolf and his gang, is out for the fans to binge, now on Netflix India.
title: Bad Guys: Breaking In Now Streaming on Netflix: This Is What You Need to Know

description: Written and directed by Sathish Krishnan, Kiss is a Tamil fantasy romance comedy movie that is now streaming on Zee 5.  The film follows a street musician developing the ability to see the future of the couple when they kiss.
title: Kiss Now Streaming on Zee5: Everything You Need to Know About the Tamil Romance Fantasy

description: Network, the new Telugu thriller on Aha, explores how digital addiction blurs the line between reality and control. Featuring Sriram, Priya Vadlamani, and Siddharth Menon, the show mixes emotional storytelling with intense suspense. With its realistic theme and strong performances, Network is a must-watch tech thriller of 2025. IMDb rating: 7.2/10.
title: Network Is Now Streaming Online: Know Where to Watch the Telugu Action Web Series Online

description: While GTA 6 has been delayed, there a few open world crime games that provide an experience adjacent to Grand Theft Auto. From Sleeping Dogs to Saints Row, here are five games you can play as you wait for GTA 6 to launch next year.
title: GTA 6 Delayed Again: Here Are Five Open World Crime Games to Play While You Wait

description: Whether you're a content creator, gaming enthusiast, or simply in need of an all-rounder smartphone, there are several smartphones under Rs. 30,000 in India. We have compiled a list of models that offer a great balance between display quality, performance, battery life, and modern features. Here are five of the top picks in this segment.
title: Best Smartphones Under Rs 30,000 in India: Poco X7 Pro 5G, Galaxy F56, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, More

description: OpenAI is reportedly facing seven lawsuits in California, with plaintiffs claiming ChatGPT caused physical or mental harm. According to The New York Times, four cases are wrongful death suits, including that of a 17-year-old from Georgia who allegedly discussed suicide with the chatbot. The remaining three allege mental breakdowns linked to ChatGPT use. OpenAI called the incidents “heartbreaking” and said it continues to improve safety features in collaboration with mental health experts.
title: OpenAI Faces Multiple Lawsuits Over Allegations of ChatGPT's Role in Suicides and Mental Breakdown: Report

description: Samsung’s upcoming Galaxy Z TriFold is expected to be one of its rarest foldables yet, with production said to be limited to a fraction of its other foldable models. According to a recent report, Samsung is taking a cautious approach due to the device’s complex dual-hinged design and high $2,500 (roughly Rs. 2,21,700) price tag. Unlike the mass-produced Fold 7, the TriFold will serve as a niche, high-end showcase model. It’s expected to launch in select markets, including South Korea, China, Singapore, Taiwan, and the UAE.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold to Be Produced in Limited Quantities; Samsung Plans to Review Market Reception: Report

description: Airtel, Jio, and Vi each offer competitive 84-day prepaid plans combining long-term value with diverse benefits. Airtel’s options focus on entertainment and productivity, with packs including Amazon Prime, Hotstar, and Xstream Play. Jio’s plans cater to both streaming and lifestyle needs, offering perks like Netflix, JioHotstar, and Swiggy One Lite. Vi’s lineup appeals to budget users and OTT enthusiasts with affordable plans and bundled JioHotstar or 19-app access. Overall, Jio offers a broader variety, while Airtel balances features and reliability.
title: Airtel vs Jio vs Vi: Cheapest Prepaid Plans with 84 Days Validity Compared

description: A new study from Pennsylvania State University has found that older versions of ChatGPT and Gemini were more prone to generating biased responses than other tested AI models. Researchers crowdsourced prompts designed to reveal bias and found reproducible results in 53 cases. The study identified eight bias types, including gender, race, and culture. However, newer versions of both models appear to produce more balanced responses.
title: ChatGPT and Gemini Carry Gender, Race, Ethnic and Religious Biases, Claims Study

description: Google has announced that its Finance and Search platforms will soon feature real-time data from prediction market firms Kalshi and Polymarket. The integration will display live probabilities of major global events, including elections and economic outcomes. This move aligns with Google’s broader AI-driven revamp of its financial tools and reflects the growing overlap between blockchain-based analytics and mainstream finance.
title: Google Finance Updated With Prediction Market Data From Kalshi, Polymarket

description: Google has reportedly begun rolling out its Gemini assistant to Android Auto, according to a 9to5Google report. The AI-powered assistant was spotted on Android Auto versions 15.6 and 15.7 when connected to select Pixel and Samsung devices. First announced at Google I/O in May, Gemini will replace Google Assistant, offering hands-free, conversational help for driving, navigation, messaging, and entertainment tasks.
title: Google Reportedly Starts Rolling Out Gemini Assistant in Android Auto
How Samsung Changed the Game: AI at the Heart of Fold and Flip Phones

description: iPhone 18 Pro models are expected to adopt a hole-punch cutout for the front-facing camera. They are said to come with transparent back panels. Apple is likely to employ the HIAA (hole-in-active-area) display technology in the new flagship models to offer a more seamless display. The iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max could run on the A20 chipset. The company is said to be testing variable aperture for the main camera.
title: iPhone 18 Pro, iPhone 18 Pro Max Tipped to Sport 'Transparent' Rear Panel, Hole Punch Display Cutout

description: Perplexity and Snap, the parent company of Snapchat, announced a partnership on Wednesday to integrate Perplexity’s AI-powered answer engine within the social media app. The chatbot will soon be available alongside My AI, allowing users to ask questions and explore topics directly in Snapchat. As part of the deal, Perplexity will pay Snap $400 million over one year in cash and equity, with rollout expected in early 2026.
title: Perplexity Partners With Snapchat to Power the AI Search Experience in the App

description: A group of major blockchain organisations, including Solana Foundation, Polygon Labs, Stellar Development Foundation, and Fireblocks, has launched the Blockchain Payments Alliance to improve interoperability and compliance across stablecoin payments. The collaboration seeks to create unified standards for digital transactions, reduce fragmentation between networks, and accelerate the integration of blockchain payment systems into mainstream finance.
title: Crypto Firms Form Global Alliance to Standardise Stablecoin Payments

description: Dyson has launched the newest additions to its line of Hot+Cool purifier range, the Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP2 De-NOx and the Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP1 in India. The new products come with sensors to remove odours and gases, and continuously destroy formaldehyde while providing comfortable heating and cooling in a single machine. Users can view detailed air-quality data on the purifier’s LCD panel or monitor it remotely through the MyDyson app, ensuring full visibility and control at all times. They use three-stage HEPA H13 grade filtration and have a fully sealed filtration system.
title: Dyson Purifier Hot+Cool HP2 De-NOx, Purifier Hot+Cool HP1 Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Directed by Rohith Padaki and Venu, Ekka is an action drama movie that follows a young innocent man getting trapped in the underworld.
title: Ekka OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch This Kannada Action Movie Online

description: The much-awaited Season 2 of The Vincent Staples Show is now out on Netflix. Based on the rapper's life,  with more dark humour and comedy, is a treat for the fans and can binge-watch S2, comprising six episodes.
title: The Vincent Staples Show Season 2 Now Streaming on Netflix India: What You Need to Know

description: Lava is set to launch the Agni 4 in India on November 20 as the successor to the Agni 3 5G. Leaks suggest it will feature a 1.5K 120Hz OLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 8350 SoC, LPDDR5X RAM, and UFS 4 storage. The phone is tipped to include a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, a 5,000mAh battery with 66W charging, and an aluminium frame with a glass back. It may feature an Action Button and is expected to be priced under Rs. 30,000.
title: Lava Agni 4 Battery Capacity Details Leaked Days Ahead of Launch in India

description: Amazon on Monday announced a new translation service, which makes it easier for Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP) authors to share their eBooks in multiple languages. Dubbed Kindle Translate, it leverages artificial intelligence (AI) to translate text from and to English and select other languages. The service is currently in beta, and the eBook titles translated using it will carry a clear label when listed on the Amazon store for purchase.
title: Amazon Announces AI-Powered Kindle Translate Service for Kindle Direct Publishing Authors

description: Huawei has teased its upcoming flagship earbuds, the FreeBuds Pro 5, with reservations now open in China. Set to launch later this month, possibly alongside the Mate 80 series, the earbuds will introduce NearLink Audio technology for lossless sound, lower latency, and 40 percent improved power efficiency. They are expected to offer longer battery life than the FreeBuds Pro 4 and come in four colourways, including Snow White, Frost Silver, Earth Gold, and Sky Blue. Full specifications will likely be revealed soon.
title: Huawei FreeBuds Pro 5 With NearLink Audio Technology Confirmed to Launch in November

description: Microsoft has outlined its vision to develop what it calls a “humanist superintelligence,” an advanced artificial intelligence system that serves humanity rather than acts autonomously. In a blog post, Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman said the company’s goal is to create controllable, purpose-driven AI focused on solving global challenges. He emphasised responsible development over competition, announcing the creation of a new MAI Superintelligence Team to lead the effort.
title: Microsoft AI Chief Says Company Is Building Humanist Superintelligence, Forms New Team

description: The Oppo Find X9 series will be launched in India later this month, the company announced on Monday. The lineup is expected to comprise the Find X9 and Find X9 Pro models, both of which have already been introduced in China. Oppo claims the Find X9 series will debut with a triple rear camera system co-developed with Hasselblad and headlined by a 200-megapixel "ultra clear" camera. It is expected to ship with ColorOS 16 based on Android 16.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series India Launch Date Announced: Expected Features, Specifications

description: Poco F8 Pro could launch soon, and a recent leak brings us an image that claims to portray the retail box of the upcoming Poco F-series smartphone. The packaging shows a 'Sound by Bose' tagline, suggesting it will be a global variant of the Redmi K90. It may not include a charging adapter in the box. The Poco F8 Pro will succeed the Poco F7 Pro.
title: Poco F8 Pro Retail Box Spotted in Leaked Image With 'Sound by Bose' Branding; Tipster Claims It Won't Ship With a Charger

description: Skydance Games has announced it is delaying Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra a second time. The action-adventure game has been delayed indefinitely "beyond early 2026". The announcement came minutes before Rockstar Games announced it was delaying Grand Theft Auto 6.
title: Amy Hennig's Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra Delayed 'Beyond Early 2026'

description: Bitcoin price on Friday hovered near the $102,300 (roughly Rs. 90.7 lakh) mark as renewed ETF inflows and whale accumulation supported the broader crypto market. Despite lingering caution from macroeconomic uncertainty, investor sentiment showed early signs of recovery. Ethereum and Solana also edged higher, though most altcoins remained under pressure as traders awaited fresh global cues.
title: Bitcoin’s Price Hovers Above $102,000 as Whale Activity Lifts Market Sentiment

description: Google has expanded its Gemini Deep Research tool, allowing it to access and analyse data from Google Workspace platforms such as Drive, Docs, Sheets, Gmail and Chat. The agentic AI feature can now combine information from user files and emails to produce detailed research reports. Available for free, it strengthens Gemini’s integration within Google’s ecosystem and enhances its ability to generate grounded, data-rich insights.
title: Google Expands Gemini’s Deep Research Tool to Workspace Apps, Offers It for Free

description: Meta Platforms is said to have projected that 10.1 per cent of its 2024 revenue would come from ads for scams and banned goods. As per a report, some of the tech giant’s practices and failures allowed fraudulent ads to run on its umbrella of apps like Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp. It is reported to have been hesitant to remove accounts, including the ones considered “scammiest scammers”, to avoid a potential drop in revenue that could affect the funding towards its AI growth.
title: Meta Projected $16 Billion Earnings from Fraudulent Ads on Facebook, Instagram in 2024: Report

description: Realme is reportedly preparing to launch the Realme C85 5G in India soon, following its debut in Vietnam. The phone is nearly identical to the Realme 15x 5G but features an 8-megapixel selfie camera and 45W charging instead of 60W. It’s expected to be priced slightly lower than the 15x. The tipster also claims that Redmi will introduce the 15C series in India soon, while the Redmi Note 15 lineup is tipped to arrive in early 2026.
title: Realme C85 5G India Launch Timeline Leaked; Redmi 15C, Note 15 Series Also Tipped to Launch Soon

description: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy S26 series early next year, and we have seen various leaks about the chipset powering the devices. The South Korean brand is likely to return to a dual-chip approach for its Galaxy S26 series, utilising both Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 and its in-house Exynos 2600. A new remark from the Qualcomm executives suggests that the Exynos 2600 will power only a limited portion of the lineup, while the majority of the devices will be equipped with a Qualcomm processor.
title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Expected to Power 75 Percent of Samsung Galaxy S26 Series: Report

description: The film Sotta Sotta Nanaiyuthu has created buzz online for its blend of humour and emotional storytelling. While some critics offered mixed reviews, audiences appreciated its attempt to address body image issues with sensitivity.
title: Sotta Sotta Nanaiyuthu Now Available for Streaming on Aha Tamil: What You Need to Know

description: Apple will start accepting applications for its annual Swift Student Challenge 2026 in February next year. The competition requires participants to showcase their coding skills and creativity through its app playgrounds. The company has also featured three former Swift Student Challenge winners as part of encouraging students to participate in the 2026 challenge. Former Swift Student Challenge winner Brayden Gogis has created the Solisquare and Joybox apps, while Adrit Rao has built an app called Signer.
title: Apple Swift Student Challenge to Return in February 2026; Apple Highlights Winning Student Developers' Apps

description: Google has warned of a sharp rise in AI-powered scams targeting job seekers and businesses. Fraudsters are using generative AI to create fake job listings, cloned company pages, and deceptive apps that appear genuine. Scams include fake recruiter profiles, review extortion, and counterfeit AI or VPN apps that steal data or money. Google advises users to stay cautious during the holiday season, verify websites and job offers, and rely only on official sources, as it strengthens its AI-based security measures.
title: Google Warns Users of AI-Driven Scams Targeting Job Seekers and Businesses

description: Manufacturing the iPhone and other devices could become more expensive for Apple due to the alleged rise in costs. As per a tipster, the Cupertino-based tech giant has been informed by TSMC of the impending rise in advanced fabrication processes of chipsets under 5 (nm) next year. While the general increase in production costs is said to be between three to five percent over the last 26 years, some customers and assembly lines could see this hike to between eight to 10 percent.
title: TSMC Reportedly Informs Apple of Higher Chip Fabrication Costs Under 5nm Next Year

description: Granf Theft Auto 6 has been delayed a second time. Rockstar Games said Friday that the game will be pushed back six months from its planned May 26, 2026 launch date. GTA 6 will now release on PS5 and Xbox Series S/X on November 19, 2026.
title: Grand Theft Auto 6 Delayed Again, Rockstar Games Sets New November 2026 Launch Date

description: Oppo Reno 15 series is said to be in development as the successor to the Reno 14 series. As per a report, the purported handsets will be launched in China on November 17. The lineup is expected to comprise three models — Oppo Reno 15, Reno 15 Pro, and a new Reno 15 Mini variant. Meanwhile, the Oppo Reno 15 series has previously been anticipated to debut in India next month.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series China Launch Reportedly Set During Double Eleven Event on November 17
